column5: In the center of Plano, minutes driving from Legacy West and shopping malls, numerous restaurants. A spacious house of 5500 sqt, shares one of the 2nd floor private room, with private washing space and shared bathroom and shower. Wi-go included, with Fully equipped kitchen with microwave, oven, coffeemaker. Brand new washer and dryer for use. Sitting on nice shaded patio enjoy a cup of wine with a view of grandness green.
column8: Sweet home in Plano (private room two)
